features: CLARIFYING SHAMPOO: This lightweight, clarifying shampoo gently cleanses, leaving hair nourished and purified
DRY HAIR SHAMPOO: From the Clean & Pure hair care system, this hydrating shampoo has an exclusive ProteinFusion blend of elastin protein and marine minerals for smooth and nourished hair
MOISTURE SHAMPOO: Full of essential ingredients to replenish vital nutrients and recover hair's natural shine, movement and moisture
SHAMPOO HAIR DETOX: Made with no silicones, dyes and parabens, this shampoo is safe for even dull, dry or damaged hair
HYDRATING SHAMPOO: Born in salons and perfected by science, each Nexxus hair care system is crafted with proteins extracted from nature’s most precious ingredients to nourish hair
CLEAN AND PURE COLLECTION: This clarifying shampoo detoxes hair and locks in moisture, in just one easy step for healthy looking hair that will feel cleaner for longer
body.description: Want a shampoo that leaves hair deeply nourished, soft, smooth and strong? Discover Nexxus Clean & Pure Shampoo. It cleanses and detoxifies hair while replenishing vital nutrients. Nexxus Clean & Pure hair products are packed with powerful ingredients to purify and revive your hair. Formulated to be silicone, dye and paraben free, this hydrating shampoo is gentle and safe to use every day. Salon-crafted with the exclusive ProteinFusion blend of elastin protein and marine minerals, this hair shampoo provides a deep clean while locking in moisture. Great for all hair types, you can unleash your hair’s natural smoothness all day long. Repairing hair is a multi-step process that includes a combination of hair products. This clarifying shampoo goes well with Nexxus Clean & Pure Nourishing Detox Conditioner, Nexxus Clean & Pure Invigorating Detox Scalp Scrub, and Nexxus Clean & Pure Nourishing Detox 5in1 Invisible Hair Oil. For a deep detox, start your hair care routine with Clean & Pure Scalp Scrub to help remove impurities including product and oil build-up. Next, cleanse with Clean & Pure Shampoo. Last, smooth Nexxus Clean & Pure Conditioner onto wet hair and wait three minutes before rinsing thoroughly. Trust your beautiful, healthy hair to the power of Nexxus.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nexxus Clean and Pure Shampoo is custom crafted salon-inspired hair product that provides a deep clean while also locking in moisture.

The Full Range Complement your shampoo with our Clean & Pure Conditioner and entire Clean & Pure Collection to detox and rebalance your hair. The Experts Nexxus uses the latest trends and technologies to create innovative hair products, like our Clean and Pure Shampoo for nourished hair. Quality Ingredients Nexxus Clean & Pure Collection helps recover shine and movement with an exclusive PROTEINFUSION blend of Elastin Protein and Marine Minerals. Proven Results Nexxus Clean and Pure Shampoo provides salon-quality care to leave hair nourished and purified.

NEXXUS CLEAN & PURE NOURISHING DETOX CONDITIONER NEXXUS CLEAN & PURE SCALP SCRUB NEXXUS CLEAN & PURE 5-IN-1 INVISIBLE HAIR OIL Main Benefit Nexxus Clean & Pure Nourishing Detox Conditioner locks in moisture for smooth, deeply nourished soft hair. Detoxify, purify, and rebalance your scalp and hair by removing impurities, including product and oil build-up. Nexxus Clean & Pure Nourishing Detox 5-in-l Invisible Hair Oil provides five benefits in one: nourishment, frizz protection, smoothness, shine and color protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a huge bottle of shampoo at a fantastic price! Smells amazing, rinses clean, and leaves hair shiny and smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So good for damaged hair!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a good clarifying shampoo for my naturally curly, heat damaged hair.I am working on rehabing my hair and getting into a better routine. I normally blow out and straighten my hair and I use a fair amount of product to keep it smooth and straight. This shampoo not only cleansed the hair really well, but my scalp feels amazing and my hair feel so soft and nourished! Normally clarifying shampoo leaves my hair feeling dry, but this did not. Super impressed and will definitely be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells like a clean, sweet and citrus scent. Cleans really well. 0% silicones and parabens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the way it cleans my hair by removing any buildup from oil treatments and heavy conditioners. I would have liked it to have a fresh or clean smell but it’s almost odorless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good shampoo
reviews.reviewText: Clean really well but gentle to your hair, shine and make hair look healthy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only fear I have is they will change the formula or discontinue this incredible shampoo!
reviews.reviewText: After years of trying to find a replacement for the shampoo I was buying at Costco, and having tried everything at great cost, I came upon this shampoo. Clearly not every shampoo works the same for everyone but this one works perfectly for me. Seriously, the most recent innovation in unsettling consumers homeostasis so that they try "something new" is a formula change...or have it made elsewhere so it's not the same. I'm am actually considering buying several bottles or more so that I always have this one shampoo. It has increased the volume, helped may hair have body and curl (I'm not young and don't have the long thick tresses I once had!) and left my hair clean for days after shampooing. A great find! Please Nexxus...don't change it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not really a clarifying shampoo
reviews.reviewText: My hair is very porous, so it soaks up anything I put in it, leaving my hair flat and feeling weighed down. I was hoping this would be a good clarifying shampoo, but that's not the case. I still gave it 3 stars because it does leave my hair feeling soft, and I think this would be a good shampoo for people wanting a high-quality anti-frizz shampoo. However, don't buy this expecting it to be a megan cleaning shampoo. It still left my hair feeling weighted down and dull.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean feel after using it
reviews.reviewText: I am sold on this shampoo. I feel my hair cleaner after using it. Light great smell is a plus
